task.title: View Your Personal Information
task.shortdesc: To view or change your personal information in MyPack Portal:

step.stepresult: On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information, including:

ul.li: Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Name)
Veterans Information (Military Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
